name: RYAN RUN: The Witch's Curse
description:
On a peaceful day, A Witch Strolls along-- and blasts innocent creatures for orbs?!?  It does strange things specifically to you... Can you reach the Witch and put a stop to her schemes?

Control: 

LEFT/A: Move Left

RIGHT/D: Move Right

UP/W: Jump (Can double jump)

DOWN/S: Trip n' Roll

SPACE/J: Chomp (Can only be used in the air)

--

Available up top is the DEMO. The full game below is only a dollar! If you see a white screen, that means the game is loading.
